content.text: How do you feel about a full on 5K GMR Turkey trot? Well it's on!

Bring your racing flats, split shorts and singlet and lets see how fast you can go. We will see if we can't round up a few small prizes. If prizes are available, don't expect them to all go to the fastest. There will be other competitions as well.
If you don't feel like going all out, that's fine too. Run the course at your own pace...it is called a Turkey TROT after all.
The finish line will be at
brewing, so go ahead and break the tape and head straight to the bar for some happy hour priced beers.
The route is posted below. Be sure to look at it, the course will not be marked :)
